author: Matt Lavietes
title: 'Jeopardy!' champ Amy Schneider announces engagement to girlfriend
description: “Jeopardy!” champion Amy Schneider revealed on Twitter that she is engaged to her girlfriend, Genevieve Davis. "Genevieve is no longer my girlfriend... she’s
content:
Jeopardy! champion Amy Schneider revealed on Twitter that she is engaged to her girlfriend, Genevieve Davis.
"Genevieve is no longer my girlfriend... shes my fiancée!!! I couldnt be happier or more … [+1786 chars]
